Package org.mitre.synthea.helpers

Class RandomCodeGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.synthea.helpers.RandomCodeGenerator
  • public abstract class RandomCodeGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates random codes based upon ValueSet URIs, with the help of a FHIR terminology service API.

    The URL for the terminology service is configured using the generate.terminology_service_url property.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<HealthRecord.Code>> codeListCache
      A cache of ValueSet URIs to their corresponding list of codes.
      static java.lang.String expandBaseUrl
      The base URL for expanding ValueSets using the terminology service.
      static java.util.List<HealthRecord.Code> selectedCodes
      A list of codes that have been selected during the current session.

    • Method Detail

      • getCode

        public static HealthRecord.Code getCode​(java.lang.String valueSetUri,
                                        long seed,
                                        HealthRecord.Code code)
        Gets a random code from the expansion of a ValueSet.
        Parameters:
        valueSetUri - the URI of the ValueSet
        seed - a random seed to ensure reproducibility of this result
        code - a fallback code to return if no new code is found
        Returns:
        the randomly selected Code, or the fallback code if no new code is found

      • getCode

        public static HealthRecord.Code getCode​(java.lang.String valueSetUri,
                                        long seed)
        Gets a random code from the expansion of a ValueSet.
        Parameters:
        valueSetUri - the URI of the ValueSet
        seed - a random seed to ensure reproducibility of this result
        Returns:
        the randomly selected code

      • codeInValueSet

        public static boolean codeInValueSet​(HealthRecord.Code code,
                                     java.lang.String valueSetUri)
        Check whether the given code is in the given ValueSet.
        Parameters:
        code - Code to check
        valueSetUri - URI of the ValueSet to check the code for
        Returns:
        true if the code is in the given valueset

      • loadValueSet

        public static void loadValueSet​(java.lang.String valueSetUri,
                                org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.ValueSet valueSet)
        Load the given value set into our cache.
        Parameters:
        valueSetUri - URI to reference this value set
        valueSet - Parsed JSON representation of FHIR valueset

        public static void setBaseUrl​(java.lang.String url)
        Sets the base URL for the terminology service.
        Parameters:
        url - The new base URL to set.
